item.description:
Publisher's description

The second issue of the Friar's Almanac. This month we take a look at other games systems, an interview with James M. Ward, living equipment, goblin poetry, sci-fi roleplaying games, phychology and roleplaying, another Skill Conduit Contest, and much much more!

Contents this month:

Giant Carnivorous Slug Correspondence ....... 4
Oops We Messed Up! .......................... 6
A Yellow Dingo Ate My Baby .................. 8
The Real World .............................. 11
The Brynryfe Campaign ....................... 17
Goblin Poetry Invitational .................. 27
Uberspace ................................... 29
Twenty Adventure Ideas ...................... 32
Event of a Moon ............................. 46
Agricultural Economics ...................... 49
Intriguing Mechanism ........................ 51
The Path Less Travelled ..................... 57
New Homeworld ............................... 65
Fascinating Locality ........................ 69
Space Odyssey ............................... 72
Quest for Inspiration ....................... 76
Adventure Review Board ...................... 78
Electronic D&D .............................. 81
Character Development ....................... 85
Curious Expedition .......................... 89
Rowan's Weekend ............................. 91
Skill Conduit Contest ....................... 101
Other Worlds than These ..................... 104
